taskbody.context: You can save diagrams as images at any time. The diagram that you want to save must be opened and displayed in the Editor area. Only one diagram can be saved as an image at a time.

step.cmd: On the DS Navigator view pane, double-click on the file (for example, fragment file, page file or module file) that you want to open to view its diagram.

stepresult.p: The fileâ€™s diagram is displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd: Within the Editor area, but outside of the diagram, right click and select File Save as image File ... .

stepresult.p: The Save as Image File dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: (Optional) If you want to change the folder where the image will be saved, click Browse to select another folder.
(Optional) In the File Name field, type the name of the image file.
(Optional) In the Image Format field, click on the down arrow to select the type of image to create.
(Optional) If you do not want to be notified that you typed a file name that already exists in the project, place a checkmark in the Overwrite Existing File Without Warning box.

step.stepresult: The diagram is saved as an image of the specified type and in the desired location.
